code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{signInWithPopup,GoogleAuthProvider,onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";import{auth}from'./firebaseconfig';import TaskList from'./components/tasklist';import TaskForm from'./components/taskform';import'./app.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const unsubscribe=onAuthStateChanged(auth,user=>{if(user){setUser(user);}else{setUser(null);}});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);const signIn=async()=>{const provider=new GoogleAuthProvider();try{await signInWithPopup(auth,provider);}catch(error){console.error("Error signing in:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"App-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Task Manager"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Welcome, ",user.displayName||'User']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskList,{})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please log in to manage your tasks."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signIn,children:"Sign In with Google"})]})]})});}export default App;
